ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Omens of War new AA Abilities
ygData.msgSnippet: O.O Ability: Origin Description: Upon using this ability, you will be transported back to a friendly city Does this mean that us rangers can finally gate!?
ygData.messageBody:
O.O

Ability: Origin
Description: Upon using this ability, you will be
transported back to a friendly city

Does this mean that us rangers can finally gate!?
Woohoo!!!

O.o?

Ability: Guardian of the Glade
Description: This ability transforms you into an
exceptionally bloodthirsty wolf that attacks with
lightning speed for a brief time. The transition into
the wolf will also cause many of your wounds to heal.

Wolf form that heals?



--- Wulfric Rennison <wulftech@...> wrote:

> Came across this link and thought I'd pass it on.
>
> http://www.rpgexpert.com/2872.html
>
> It lists some of the new AA skills that should be
> coming out with Omens of War. I think these might
> even be in process on Beta Test server.
>
> Check em out.
>
> Wulfric


=====
"Yes, I am a ranger"
"Good. I have a task for you" *whispers to the elf*
"You want me to be WHAT!!!!"
*The Dwarf nods*
"Thats suicide!"
"No I will not be your bait to that dreadful dragon! Find someone else. Like maybe a human monk."
"But we heard Dragons prefer the fear of a ranger. Especially an elven rangeress."
*Huntress Starnyte storms away from the village muttering foul words in the Feir'Dal language*
"Dwarves are only good to be food to the lizardmen, not party members."
